subject: Baseball
Academy Awards (Oscars)
Movies
lead_paragraph: Shawn Kelley, a pitcher in the Yankees’ bullpen, was childhood friends with the actress Jennifer Lawrence, who is nominated for best supporting actress for her role in “American Hustle.”
